==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|降|霊|術}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|lang=ja|sort=こうれいじゅつ|降霊|tr1=kōrei|t1=calling the spirits of the dead|術|tr2=jutsu|t2=technique, art}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|こうれいじゅつ}}

# [[necromancy]]

====Related terms====
* {{ja-r|交霊術|こうれいじゅつ}}: [[spiritualism]]

====Usage notes====
Of the two terms {{l|ja|降霊術}} and {{l|ja|交霊術}}, the former implies more of a sense of [[summon]]ing, and the latter more of a sense of [[exchange]] or [[communication]].
